<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fiery Retort](/Feats.aspx?ID=2977) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 199 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[flame order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=5)

**Trigger**
An opponent adjacent to you hits you with a melee weapon or a melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack.

</column>

---

Ignoring your pain, you sear your attacker with a wave of flame. The triggering opponent takes fire damage equal to your level.
name: Fiery Retort
